doc:
Slim Pickens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slim_Pickens 0 Louis Burton Lindley Jr. (June 29, 1919 – December 8, 1983), better known by his stage name Slim Pickens, was an American rodeo performer and film and television actor. During much of his career, Pickens played mainly cowboy roles, and is perhaps best remembered today for his comic roles in Dr. Strangelove and Blazing Saddles. Louis_Burton_Lindley_Jr. ( June_29_,_1919 – December_8_,_1983 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Slim_Pickens , was an_American_rodeo_performer and film_and_television_actor . During much of his_career , Pickens played mainly cowboy_roles , and is perhaps_best_remembered_today for his_comic_roles in Dr._Strangelove and Blazing_Saddles .
